description:
For skiers who get out there... way out there. Built to handle any and all backcountry conditions, the Wayback 92 is an all-around ski for long backcountry forays. All Terrain Rocker with early rise tip and camber underfoot provides versatility and easy turning performance for skiers of all abilities. The 92mm width underfoot performs well on hard technical snow and is wide enough to float in deeper snow. A good choice for all-around backcountry skiing and hut tours.

  • Paulownia wood core is lively and flexible with excellent strength to weight ratio
  • All-Terrain rocker for great versatility in all conditions
  • Snophobic topsheet reduces snow buildup and fatigue while breaking trail
  • Progressive sidecut provides easy turning and handling for skiers of any ability
  • Tapered tip and tail have a flat profile that makes them easy to plunge if needed
name: K2 Wayback 92 Skis - Unisex
